description:
In Petite Adventure you drive tiny cars around a house and complete challenging objectives.

Do a 360 drift, pop balloons, play golf, collect coins, and explore each level. Petite Adventure features 32 different challenges to play organized based on difficulty.

Control a wide variety of miniature automobiles including cars and trucks, master the art of driving in tight household spaces, and donâ€™t fall off the edge!


Features:
* Cute tiny cars
* 32 Levels
* Different mechanics (drift, pop balloons, play golf, and more)
* 3D cute graphics
name: Petite Adventure
